project.description: A sample job running some console scripts

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: pwd ls -al env | grep ROS roslaunch publisher_example move.launch & MOVE_ID=$! sleep 15s kill $MOVE_ID roslaunch publisher_example stop.launch & STOP_ID=$! sleep 5s kill $STOP_ID rosservice call /gazebo/reset_simulation "{}" echo "Job finished"
